long_description: Built to keep feet happy during all-day, all-mountain skiing, the men's Tecnica Ten.2 100 ski boots feature a medium flex with roomy, 102mm lasts for intermediates seeking comfort. Soft, flexible shell over insteps makes it easy to spread the shell, put boots on and go ski. Anatomical shell shape holds the foot securely while providing a comfortable fit. Cuff alignment matches the angle of the cuff with the shape of the lower leg, increasing comfort and performance. The men's Tecnica Ten.2 100 ski boots feature a medium flex suited to intermediate skiers.
short_description: Built to keep feet happy during all-day, all-mountain skiing, the men's Tecnica Ten.2 100 ski boots feature a medium flex with roomy, 102mm lasts for intermediates seeking comfort.
